title: Ambanis Donating ₹500 Crores For A Ram Temple? A FactCheck
subtitle: A picture of Mukesh Ambani being shared as donating ₹500 crores for Ram temple in Ayodhya to Yogi Adityanath.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim: In this episode of BOOM Reports, we tell you the truth behind a viral social media post which claims that Ambani has donated Rs. 500 Crores for Ram Temple. But the truth behind this post is a little different. BOOM found the image in a Times Of India article with a headline, "Ambani offers e-learning platform for UP farmers" dated December 23rd, 2017.
